product.name: GRECERELLE Women 2025 Cap Sleeve Tops Summer Casual Tee Shirt Loose Crew Neck Basic Tank Trendy Work Vacation Outfits (S-2XL)
product.bullet_points:
• SIZE GUIDE: S=US 4-6, M=US 8-10, L=US 12-14, XL=US 16-18, 2XL=US 20-22. see rich description for more size details. Women's tank tops are made from a cotton blend, featuring soft comfort and breathability.
• Women's summer tank top features classic elements such as cap sleeves, round neckline, and stripes. Loose fit with medium stretch, perfect for many body types.
• Sleeveless top style is easy and casual, can be easily paired with shorts, skirts, jeans, leggings, etc. to meet the needs of daily wear.
• Women's t-shirts are a good choice of item from daily life, work, holiday, school and outdoor.
• WASHING INSTRUCTIONS: low temperature wash recommended, machine washable, do not bleach, low temperature ironing, hang to dry.
